Method Detail

normalise

NormalisedModel normalise()
                          throws NormaliserException,
                                 Exception
Normalises the problem- and parameter-specification and returns a normalised model. This approach does FULL normalisation.

Returns:
a normalised model.
Throws:
NormaliserException
Exception

normalise

NormalisedModel normalise(char normaliseType)
                          throws NormaliserException,
                                 Exception
Normalises the problem- and parameter-specification and returns a normalised model. Normalises corresponding to the normalisation type (evaluation only, ordering only, etc)

Parameters:
normaliseType -
Returns:
a normalised model.
Throws:
NormaliserException
Exception
